Translations.Translation: Hmh this level seems familiar. However simply turing the Gravityfield on and off won't give the Colliderbody enought energy to close such a huge gap. If you think back to the first level you hopefully have read through the Gravityfields Eventinformations. If not do so! Also have a look at the available events of the Gravityfield. This should be enought to complete this level, therefor touch this field to finish the tutorial ...
